article.headline: N.C.-Asheville 94, Montreat 64
article.story: ASHEVILLE, N.C. (AP) -- Kenny George scored 16 points to lead five double-figure scorers in North Carolina-Asheville's 94-64 rout of Montreat on Monday. Vincent James had 13 points, Bryan Smithson added 12 and Reid Augst and John Williams scored 10 apiece for the Bulldogs (10-3), which continued its best start since 1983-84. UNC Asheville shot 51 percent and held a 56-35 rebounding advantage in improving to 14-1 against Montreat in regular-season games, winning four straight in the western North Carolina series. Kinard Barnett had 14 points and Matthew Rushing added 13 for Montreat (5-8), which has lost two straight since winning three in a row in early December. Asheville had a season-high 25 assists in improving to 8-1 at home.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
